awd_titl_txt: Models of Continental Extension with Emphasis on Lower      Crustal Flow
awd_abstract_narration: This project is a renewal of a previous grant concerned with 2-D                modelling of continental extension and rifting.  The P.I. will                  extend his earlier developed 2-D model of continental rifting which             incorporates the effect of lower crustal flow and explains the                  development of wide continental extension areas with high heat                  flow.  The P.I. will now use this model to derive the parameters                (stress & strain, heat flow, time etc.) which control the long time             development of continental margins.  Then these will be compared                with several margins as a test.

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE TRUSTEES OF COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY IN THE CITY OF NEW YORK

perf_inst.perf_inst_name: Columbia University Lamont Doherty Earth Observatory
